articles.title: Bryce Harper respects Hunter Strickland for not throwing at his head and just wanting to fight - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Even though Bryce Harper didn't think Hunter Strickland should've harbored his anger for three years, he had to respect the reliever for wanting a fair fight.
articles.content:
Even if the baseball world may never forget the infamous 2017 brawl between Bryce Harper and Hunter Strickland, Harper has done his best to put the incident behind him.
In fact, he's come to respect Strickland for it.
